segments.text: Hi , I'm Jake . I'm new to the choir . What's your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , there , my name is Tonia .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I can do both soprano and alto but the director asked me to sing alto for the next perforate . What about you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Looks like we both float back and forth . I'm baritone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our bass section is really good . You're going to love singing with them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard them warming up earlier . You're right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's good to have you in the group . We can always use a good baritone !
segments.speaker: S2
